medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started yesterday, initially diffuse but today more localized to the right upper quadrant (RUQ). The patient also experienced nausea and decreased appetite, with loose bowel movements yesterday. No vomiting, fever, or dysuria reported.
